injectors.label: Match Existing Style
injectors.promptFragment: Ensure the new surfaces complement and match the existing design style of the room.

injectors.label: Modern Update
injectors.promptFragment: Choose modern, contemporary finishes that update the space with a fresh, current look.

injectors.label: Classic Traditional
injectors.promptFragment: Choose classic, traditional finishes that give the space a timeless, elegant feel.

injectors.label: Seamless Transitions
injectors.promptFragment: Ensure seamless transitions between the changed surfaces and adjacent unchanged areas.

injectors.label: Natural Wood Grain
injectors.promptFragment: For wood flooring, show realistic natural wood grain patterns with subtle variations.

injectors.label: Consistent Grout Lines
injectors.promptFragment: For tile flooring, ensure consistent, realistic grout lines throughout.

injectors.label: Accent Wall Only
injectors.promptFragment: Only change the color of the main accent wall, leaving other walls unchanged.

injectors.label: Sheer Curtains
injectors.promptFragment: Use light, sheer curtains that allow natural light to filter through.

injectors.label: Blackout Curtains
injectors.promptFragment: Use thick, blackout curtains suitable for bedrooms or media rooms.
